title: Python Mulls a Change in Version Numbering
author: Joab Jackson
description: Despite popular belief, Python does not use the industry standard semantic versioning, and this has led to frustrations around backward compatibility and End-of-Life expectancies.
cntitle: Python 考虑更改版本编号
cndescription: 尽管普遍认为 Python 使用行业标准语义版本控制，但这导致了关于向后兼容性和生命周期预期的挫败感。
